I’m going bird hunting.

Suit yourself. I’m

not in the mood

to see common animals I’ve seen elsewhere.

At the Galapagos, Darwin lacked

the motivation and energy to go

exploring as he had done at other places.

Why go hunt

when I can finally

get some rest.

Because they thought they had seen

the same birds and animals on other islands too, they didn’t bother

to collect and organize specimens.

Darwin would later regret this decision.

The geology of

the island is rather peculiar.

119
